item.title: Ray K Q & A | Will Living Forever Suck? | Singularity University
item.description:
Ray K Q & A | Will Living Forever Suck? | Singularity University

Ray Kurzweil: Will Living Forever Suck? Subscribe: http://bit.ly/1Wq6gwm Connect with Singularity University: Website: http://singularityu.org Singularity HUB:http://singularityhub.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/singularityu Twitter: https://twitter.com/singularityu Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/singularity-university Google+: https://plus.google.com/+singularityu About Singularity University: Singularity University is a benefit corporation headquartered at NASA's research campus in Silicon Valley.
